item.title: Install raspotify on Ubuntu server 20.04 (64 bit)/64 bit Armhf
item.description: Note: Use this at your own risk! This worked for me on Ubuntu 20.04 Until it is supported on 64 bit distros Add armhf sudo dpkg --add-architecture armhf sudo apt update wget https://dtcooper.github.io/raspotify/raspotify-latest.deb sudo dpkg -i raspotify-latest.deb If it fails, install missing dependencies. Usually libasound2. sudo apt install libasound2 If that breaks then apt --fix-broken install Once more sudo dpkg -i raspotify-latest.deb
